detail_desc: Dungarees in soft organic cotton jersey with frill-trimmed straps that cross at the back and fasten with a press-stud at the front. Elastication at the back of the waist and ribbed hems.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with a deep neckline front and back and short sleeves.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey made from a viscose blend with a racer back. Cut-out section at the back and a rounded hem.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with hard-worn details, an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Thin metal chain necklace with a pendant decorated with faceted plastic beads. Adjustable length approx. 38-45 cm.
Sleeveless top in pleated jersey with a slight sheen.
Short skirt in a sturdy weave with a wrapover at the front with a large press-stud at the side, and a visible zip and concealed button at the back. Lined.
Platform ankle boots in imitation leather with lacing at the front and a zip at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 3 cm, covered heels 11.5 cm.

Short-sleeved shirt in patterned Tencel™ lyocell with a turn-down collar and French front. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Jumper in a soft knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Dress in soft, washed Tencel™ lyocell denim with embroidery and a seam with gathers front and back at the top. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, and long balloon sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Round-necked T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with a chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Set with a dress and matching bolero. Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Narrow cut at the top with short shoulder straps, a gathered seam at the hips and a flared skirt that is slightly longer at the back. Unlined. Bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and a faceted, heart-shaped button at the top.
Moccasins in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with soft terry inside, imitation leather trims and soft suede soles.
Jersey top with a motif on the front, short sleeves and gathers in the sides for optimum fit.
Long-sleeved cardigan in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a V-neck, buttons down the front and front pockets. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut sleeveless top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a round neckline and shoulder pads.
Short, wide dress in soft cotton jersey with a ribbed collar and press-studs at the top. Dropped shoulders, short wide sleeves and large patch front pockets.
Waterproof hi-top boots in imitation leather with a padded shaft, elasticated lacing and an adjustable hook and loop tab. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
V-neck jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves and roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Gathers in the sides for best fit.
Shirt in an airy cotton weave in a straight, relaxed style with a grandad collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a rounded hem.
Unicorn fancy dress costume. Sleeveless top section in brushed jersey. Lightly padded bottom section with a head, legs and shimmering hooves. Padded, shimmering wings and a faux fur mane and tail.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Knee-length swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.

Pyjamas in soft jersey made from a viscose and cotton blend. Wide, short-sleeved top with a contrasting colour neckline and a print motif on the front. Short, patterned shorts with an elasticated waist.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and print motif.
Fitted jersey top with narrow shoulder straps.

Calf-length dress in an airy Tencel™ lyocell and viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with a slit and covered button at the cuffs, and a curved hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.

Short, V-neck dress in stretch jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, decorative crossover straps at the back and tie straps at the top. Gathered seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.

Sports bag that can be worn as a backpack in a patterned weave with two handles at the top and narrow adjustable shoulder straps. One large outer compartment with a plastic fastener and two smaller outer compartments. Size 39x50 cm.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and a high cut at the back.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey an appliqué on the front and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Pyjamas with a strappy top and shorts in a soft viscose weave. V-neck top with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and overlocked scalloped edges at the top. Short shorts with narrow, covered elastication at the waist and overlocked scalloped hems.
Short dress in an airy weave with an opening at the top and small, pleated stand-up collar with ties at the front. Short, pleated cap sleeves and a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist. Lined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, flounces at the sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Short-sleeved blouse in an airy weave with a round neckline and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Baby Exclusive. All-in-one suit in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood and buttons down the front. Patch front pockets, sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs and hems, and concealed press-studs at the crotch (not in sizes 1-3Y). Soft brushed inside.
Straight-cut coat in felted fabric with a collar, zip down the front, patch front pockets and faux fur cuffs. Lined.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Shirt jacket in cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Trainers in cotton canvas with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Shirt in cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Wide, ankle-length trousers in cotton twill with a high, elasticated paper bag waist and tie belt. Fake fly, side pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidery detail on the chest and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Thin nylon socks in various designs.

Set with a knitted hooded jacket and pair of trousers in soft thermal fleece. Jacket with a faux shearling-lined hood with ears on top, and a concealed zip down the front with a chin guard. Trousers with wide, foldover jersey ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Cropped, hooded jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a V-neck and drawstring at the top. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem.
Dress in stretch organic cotton jersey with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Hi-tops in knitted fabric and imitation leather with a ribbed shaft, elasticated front and loop at the back. Mesh insoles and rubber soles.
Top in light sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Blouse in airy linen with a V-neck, buttons down the front and a detachable tie belt under the bust. Two open chest, pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button,.
Hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood and zip down the front with a chin guard. Side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front and darts and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Slip-on fabric trainers with a decorative knot detail at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Long-sleeved jumper in rib-knit cotton with a V-neck, dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Tights with an elasticated waist. 20 denier.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Fully lined bikini bottoms in sturdy fabric with a high waist, visible seams, laser-cut edges and a half-string back.

Knee-length, fitted dress in sequin-embroidered lace with a round neckline and open section at the back with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves and a scalloped edge at the cuffs and hem. Jersey lining.
Calf-length dress in an airy, patterned viscose weave with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck, short, gently flared sleeves and smocking at the waist. Unlined.
Fancy dress costume in velour and jersey with a glitter print. High, lightly padded collar at the back, long sleeves with asymmetric edges, a seam at the waist and a flared, lined tulle skirt.
Set with a vest top and shorts in soft, printed cotton jersey. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Bohemian top in a viscose weave with short, frill-trimmed raglan sleeves. Elasticated top with a decorative tasselled bow, and a smocked hem.
Knee-length coat in felted fabric with narrow notch lapels and a tie belt at the waist. Side pockets, a single back vent and no buttons. Tape trimmed inner seams. Unlined.
Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with real suede details. Narrow shoulder strap with carabiner hooks at both ends and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 18x24 cm.
T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a motif.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.

Blouse in twill made from a cotton and modal blend with a V-shaped opening at the top and a small, smocked stand-up collar with twisted ties at the front. Long raglan sleeves with smocking at the cuffs.
Cotton jersey T-shirt.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Trims and stripes down the sides in a contrasting colour.
Waspie in lace and mesh with support panels at the front and a hook-and-eye fastening.
V-neck jumper in a rib knit with a wrapover front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Plastic Alice bands with a bow on top.
